abstract: American Civil Liberties Union files lawsuit against city of Honolulu for its tactics in clearing out homeless population.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers with the American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit in federal court Wednesday against Honolulu over the way city officials are clearing out homeless encampments.

headline.main: Hawaii: Honolulu Is Sued Over Treatment of Homeless
headline.print_headline: Hawaii: Honolulu Is Sued Over Treatment of Homeless

snippet: Lawyers with the American Civil Liberties Union filed a lawsuit in federal court Wednesday against Honolulu over the way city officials are clearing out homeless encampments.
